subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the founder of Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चिट्टोरगढ की फोट के निर्माणी कौन थे?
explanation_en: Chittorgarh Fort was founded by Rao Jodha of Meera Clan.
explanation_hi: चिट्टोरगढ के निर्माण कर्नावा मेरा जन्मनावा के मेरा जन्मनावा के मेरा जन्मनावा के मेरा जन्मनावा के मेरा जन्मनावा के मेरा जन्मनावा
B_hi: राजस्थान मेरा जन्मनावा के मेरा जन्मनावा
explanation_en: Rao Jodha, a Rajput chieftain, is widely known for his role in the construction of the مهرانجار Fort in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. He was a general of the Rathore clan and played a crucial part in the establishment of Jodhpur as a powerful kingdom.

explanation_en: Rao Jodha, the founder of Jodhpur, established the Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. He was a prominent figure of the Rathore clan and played a vital role in shaping the history of the region.

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: What is the largest city in Rajasthan in terms of population?

explanation_en: Jaisamand, also known as Amer, is the largest city in Rajasthan in terms of area. The city is famous for its rich history and architectural beauty.

explanation_en: Chittor, also known as Chittorgarh, is the former capital of Mewar kingdom.
